name: Aikido Security
tagline: Secure everything you build, host, and run.
description: Your central code, cloud, and runtime security platform. Fix vulnerabilities automatically with AI AutoFix and AutoTriage. Cut false positives by 85%. Security is an everyone problem. So get security done, and get devs back to building.

name: Cosine CLI
tagline: AI pair programming directly in your terminal
description: Cosine CLI brings our AI coding agent to your terminal. It writes/refactors/tests code, runs shell, understands your repo, and continues browser tasks. Autonomous or interactive. Full access to familiar local tools. Meeting developers where they work.

name: Oboe
tagline: Learning, for the curiously minded
description: Oboe is the worldâ€™s first generalized AI-powered learning platform. Oboe lets anyone instantly create educational courses to learn about any topic in a more personalized, efficient, and fun way than ever before.

name: Plander.ai
tagline: Your personal AI PM that turns goals into steps
description: Plander.ai â€” your AI-powered personal project manager. Break down big goals into actionable steps, integrate seamlessly with your calendar, and adapt dynamically to changes. Plander helps you "Land your plan & Win your game."

name: Rocket Journal
tagline: Your AI-powered mental health companion
description: Introducing Rocket Journal: An AI-powered voice journal to decode your thoughts, uncover patterns, and unlock clarity â€” all in just minutes a day. Speak your mind in a safe rant space or reflect deeply with guided prompts. On iOS only. Coming soon to Android.

name: The New Userlist
tagline: Email automation for sophisticated product marketers
description: Enter the new Userlist: best-in-class visual automation, powerful segments, realtime SaaS data. Built for product dreamers, marketing geeks, and email nerds ðŸŽ© Dreaming of ambitious behavior-based user journeys? Time to make them real.

name: Brand.dev
tagline: The internet's brand & logo api
description: The brand api for customizing online experiences. Get logos, colors, fonts, and more from any domain via API in seconds. Highest rated company logo API.

name: Lossless on Spotify Premium
tagline: A richer, more detailed listening experience
description: Lossless audio has been one of the most anticipated features and now, finally, itâ€™s rolling out to Premium listeners. With Lossless, you can now stream tracks in up to 24-bit/44.1 kHz FLAC, unlocking greater detail across nearly every song on Spotify.

name: Corgi AI
tagline: Turn your saved content into your second brain.
description: Corgi is your true AI read-later for everything you save â€” videos, articles, PDFs â€” a second brain that digests, organizes, and chats with your saved content. No more content graveyards.

name: Stable Audio 2.5
tagline: Enterprise-grade sound production
description: Stable Audio 2.5 is a new audio model from Stability AI built for enterprise sound production. It delivers fast, high-quality, structured tracks in seconds, with advanced control features like audio inpainting for professional workflows.

name: Lumro
tagline: AI Agents for sales, support and more
description: Lumro helps you create 24/7 AI Agents for sales and support that handle customer chats, perform actions, close sales and provide instant help across web, WhatsApp and more.

name: unloved
tagline: Buy and sell vibe coded business apps.
description: Buy curated apps built by product leaders for your use case. Launch your next idea, solve a business pain-point or automate boring workflows. Get started for free with our community built apps or sell an app you built.

name: Aloude
tagline: Be the voice people trust
description: Aloude lets you record quick audio takes or interviews, then instantly turns them into branded videos ready to share on X, LinkedIn, or embed on your site. Perfect for experts, creators, and businesses to grow authority through voice in just 2 clicks.

name: Bloodrec
tagline: AI health companion for your bloodwork and beyond
description: Decode your bloodwork and get more than a report - an AI health companion that remembers your history, guides you over text, and connects insights to action. Your dashboard gives 10x more context than legacy lab reports.

name: Kiara
tagline: Your AI Voicemail Assistant
description: Never miss a call again with Kiara. Our AI voicemail assistant answers when you canâ€™t, provides personalized greetings, transcribes messages, and sends instant email summariesâ€”helping your business stay responsive and look professional.

name: KristNotes
tagline: Open-source shared notes with Markdown & Mermaid support
description: It's designed for students, teams, or anyone who believes learning works better together. The app lets you write Markdown notes with Mermaid diagram support, save and build on others' public notes, and switch between light/dark mode.

name: srRAW Cinema Camera for iPhone
tagline: CinemaDNG RAW film and video camera for 12 Pro and newer
description: srRAW Cinema Camera is the original and only RAW cinema camera for iPhone. Sustainable by design, srRAW works with iPhone Pro 12/14 regular and newer. It offers native DaVinci Resolve "Plug n Grade" support (free + Studio).

name: Gitea Mirror
tagline: Automated github to gitea repository mirroring & backup
description: Automatically mirror and backup your GitHub repositories to self-hosted Gitea. Keep your code safe with scheduled syncing, bulk operations, and real-time monitoring. Free and open source.

name: StayUpAI
tagline: Stay ahead of the AI curve â€“ Never miss what matters
description: Stop drowning in AI news. Get curated daily briefs, track topics that matter to you, and receive instant alerts on game-changing developments. From research papers to product launches â€“ everything filtered for signal, not noise.

name: Thirdeye
tagline: Make your brand discoverable in the age of AI
description: AI is the new search. Thirdeye helps your brand stay discoverable by tracking how ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity mention you. Get insights on sentiment, competitor benchmarks, and real-time alerts when narratives change.
